short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts volume metric of ingredients to weights

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you love to cook but hate that recipes try to give you measurements of granular solids in liquid volume, i.e. cups of sugar, than this app is for you. Go to any one of the sites listed below and it will convert the recipe automatically.

foodnetwork.com
foodnetwork.ca
allrecipes.com
epicurious.com
tasty.co
delish.com

The measurements I use to covert are listed below to give you some background under the hood information, all listed as grams per cup:

All Purpose Flour: 120
Baking Powder: 192
Baking Soda: 144
Brown Sugar: 180
Butter: 226
Cocoa Powder: 113.4
Cornmeal: 170
Cornstarch: 127.6
Granular Sugar: 200
Powdered Sugar: 200
Self-rising Flour: 113
Sifted Flour: 110

Future versions will include the ability to attempt conversions on non-listed websites as well as the ability to edit the grams/cup. This is the initial version and may be a little buggy. Would love to hear your feedback. Please email me at foodscaleextension@gmail.com with thoughts and suggestions.

Cook smart!
